info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL PULASKI...MASSAC...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...NORTHERN BALLARD AND NORTHWESTERN MCCRACKEN COUNTIES... At 154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, La Center, Brookport, Barlow, Karnak, West Paducah, New Columbia, Barkley Regional Airport, Kevil, Joppa, Olmsted and New Grand Chain. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 4. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 24 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
